Articles.Content:
If I were to make a Kerbal war series it would look something like this:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1xw87hUrAEw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Don't mean to poop on your parade, but... 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZXh92I8E15M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I got the name first ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But judging by the fact that I haven't made a second episode in more than 6 months, you can go ahead and use the K in Conflict. This series is long dead for me. Good luck!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T19:52:14Z" title="05/27/2015 07:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by One-Way Films**

Damn it, I checked YouTube for ones with names like that!

Oh well. I'll look at your video, maybe I'll get some ideas from it. I already have one big idea on how to make my series (if I make one) unique - Fighting for KerbinSide launch sites.

[EDIT]

... DAMN IT CAN'T I HAVE ONE ORIGINAL IDEA
